a12: ```It will cost 250 credits to upgrade Ability 1 from 1 to 2.```
a13: ```It will cost 750 credits to upgrade Ability 1 to 3.```

a14: ```It will cost 1500 credits to upgrade Ability 1 from 1 to 4. It will cost 750 credits to upgrade Ability 1 from 3 to 4.```
